extendedInfo.description: *REQUIRES ROOT ACCESS*Who needs a clumsy task killer?MinFreeManager allows you to set the parameters of Android's built in memory manager the way YOU want them. No more closed apps hogging your precious memory.Read info @ http://tiny.cc/kiC6YUpdate v1.6 - Now supports auto apply after a reboot! (...on some roms)

reviews.title: Works good
reviews.comment: No special permissions and does its job... don\'t use task killers but rather tweak the built in android memory manager. This works perfectly well for me on rooted Galaxy S Vibrant.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Author warns that messing with the app can screw up your system, but doesn\'t give any info on what the settings do. tldr= Needs in-app help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Once you learn the proper settings its great, but they provide no help I had to Google for help. Apply at boot doesn\'t work either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t save settings on reboot. If you\'re ok with reapplying settings every session, it does speed up phone noticably with agressive memory sets.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wonderful app! Dont understand why morons rate an app low because it requires root access?? I think idiots like that shouldnt buy a smart phone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app on my evo to tweak how the os handles memory reservation. So far, so good! Very easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Rooted Droid running BBv0.4 will give 5 stars when the run on boot works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very awesome! Hero runs better than ever! No need for ATK anymore!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I must say its the best ram app ive used, but i got to unistall then reinstall everytime i restart my phone Samsung Intercept
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems to work I got no clue. I just use the aggresive preset. I am by no means qualified to do anything custom.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works extremely well but only 4 stars cause apply at boot does not work on my phone (rooted Samsung intercept).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t listen to the morons that don\'t have rooted phones. Works great, settings don\'t apply at boot, no big deal. Rooted DX
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Look no further
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your money on bling-bling apps which only end up taking up memory themselves, and are in fact just a shameless rip-off of this app (with plagiarisms in the documentation, making it appear as if they thought of it - you know who I\'m talking about, AutoKiller).  This app does what it says, does what it needs to do (which is allow you to tune the OOM settings), no special permissions, and once you\'ve tuned the settings, it needs no special program or service to run.  Excellent results on my HTC Sensation (rooted, ARHD 6.8.0). Tuned using the preset \"Aggressive\" and my Sensation is running *really* smoothly again. Thanks for your work, oldskool73!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic app...Love it...
reviews.comment: Wish I only knew how to set it up property ...Update!!!!...Got it now.I simply set it to mild...its flawless .Don\'t overstep your cellphone or it will become unstable Put it to mild.Mine works flawlessly This is such a great app!!!No Adds,it\'s small...worth 25 stars...thx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So far, amazing. Use this to your specifications and it will speed up your phone for you. Dev: Still doesn\'t apply at boot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, trade your task killer app with this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: could do with more presets and the ability to save multiple presets under user-defined names. Extra star when it does that
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: As long as the ROM you\'re running supports init.d. that is where it saves the boot settings. If your ROM doesn\'t support this it won\'t save at boot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Two stars, useless if it can\'t Apply At Boot. Ugh. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Moto droid. Love this app! Apply on boot works on cyanogenmod! Around 50-60 mb free ram even at startup!
reviews.author: A Google User
